---
title: "News"
subtitle: "Collected media mentions about our initiatives, team members and partnered projects."
title-block-banner: false

# the news page of our website is a kind of quarto listing page
# it contains one list, in the news/news.yml file 

# for complete documentation explaining how quarto listings work: 
# https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-listings.html#overview

listing:
  - id: news
    contents: 
      - news.yml
      
    # how does this list appear - see options & examples here:
    # https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-listings.html#listing-types  
    type: table
    table-hover: true 
    
    # What information about news items should we show on the news page?
    # see documentation here for more info: 
    # https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-listings.html#listing-fields            
    fields: [title, date]
    field-display-names:
       title: Title
       description: Description
       categories: Tags
    categories: true

    # Maximum length of description  
    # 200 characters
    max-description-length: 200 
    
          
    # How to order & search for news items?
    # Options here: https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-listings.html#sorting-items  
    sort: "date desc"   
    sort-ui: false
    filter-ui: [date,title,categories]
    

---
